Texts.Chs: 建造^orange;基因提取器^reset;来升级你的加工台是一个好主意，因为它^green;速度更快^reset;！每种植物种子都可以放在种子实验室中，并产生不同的结果。从最基础的植物开始，开始你的工作。
Texts.Eng: Constructing a ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; upon upgrading your Machining Table is a good idea, as they are ^green;much faster^reset;! Effectively every plant seed can be placed within seed labs, and each one will produce different results. Start with basic plants, and work up from there.

So you've built a ^orange;Sprouting Table^reset;? Why are you looking so clueless? It's simple: Toss in a ^orange;Potato Seed^reset; and wait about 60 seconds. You'll get a useful ^green;gene^reset; for your botany research, or other goods
